member.name: M:MessageBus.DiscardDuplicateMessageHandlerExtensions.WithDuplicateMessageDetection``1(MessageBus.IAsyncMessageEventHandler{``0})
member.summary: Returns a new async handler which will detect already received messages. Already received message will get dropped silently. The default duplicate detection implementation will get used.
member.remarks: If the provided implements , the result will implement that interface as well.

member.name: M:MessageBus.Decorations.Duplications.IDuplicateDetection.HandleReceivedMessage(MessageBus.MessageId)

member.name: M:MessageBus.Decorations.Duplications.IDuplicateDetection.ForgetMessage(MessageBus.MessageId)
member.summary: Instructs the duplication detection to forget about the provided . A future call to must return true for the same message id again.

member.name: M:MessageBus.Decorations.Versioning.IVersionDetection`1.HandleMessageVersion(`0)
member.summary: Gets the version from an incomming message. Returns true if the provided is newer then the latest known version, otherwise false.

member.name: M:MessageBus.Decorations.Versioning.IVersionDetection`1.ForgetVersion(`0)
member.summary: Instructs the version detection to forget about the provided . A future call to must return true for the same version id again.
